document.use = "BE"

/*-------------------*/ 
/*-----spread[1]-----*/ 
/*-------------------*/ 

spread[1].minuse = 1
spread[1].position = 1

# page[1]
# ---------------------

page[1].position = 1
page[1].minuse = 1
page[1].maxuse = 1
page[1].groups = ["p1_normgr",[image_p1_normimage, text_p1_normtext]]
page[1].stacks = [["p1_norm", p1_normgr]]

text_p1_title.value = page.this.title.value
image_p1_normimage.value = page.this.field_p3p00normimage.value 
text_p1_normtext.value = page.this.field_p3p00normname.value
image_p1_fabric.value = page.this.field_p3p00fabricimage.value

norm.marginy = -12.2
norm.maxuse = 4

/*-------------------*/ 
/*-----spread[2]-----*/ 
/*-------------------*/ 

# page[2]
# ---------------------

page[2].minuse = 1
page[2].side = "left"
page[2].groups = ["p2_clgr",[color_p2_color, object_p2_grad, text_p2_colortext]]
page[2].stacks = [["p2_cl", p2_clgr]]

text_p2_title.value = page.this.title.value
text_p2_body.value = page.this.field_p3p00tekst.value
image_p2_fabric.value = page.this.field_p3p00fabricimage.value
color_p2_color.value = page.this.field_p3p00kleurcmyk.value
object_p2_grad.visible = page.this.field_p3p00kleur_hi_vis.value
text_p2_colortext.value = page.this.field_p3p00kleurtitel.value

# page[3]
# ---------------------

page[3].side = "right"
page[3].groups = ["p3_prodgr",[text_p3_prodnr, text_p3_proddesc]]
page[3].stacks = [["p3_prod", p3_prodgr]]


text_p3_title.value = page.this.title.value
text_p3_prodnr.value = page.userselect.field_p3p00typenaam.value
text_p3_proddesc.value = page.userselect.title.value
image_p3_img1.value = page.userselect.field_p3p00mainimage.value
image_p3_img2.value = page.userselect.field_p3p00mainimage.value
image_p3_img3.value = page.userselect.field_p3p00mainimage.value
image_p3_img4.value = page.userselect.field_p3p00mainimage.value
image_p3_img5.value = page.userselect.field_p3p00mainimage.value
text_p3_manikinbody.value = content.700.bodytext.value
image_p3_manikinimage.value = content.userselect.image.value


/*-------------------*/ 
/*-----spread[3]-----*/ 
/*-------------------*/ 

# page[4]
# ---------------------

page[4].ignore = true

# ---------------------

# page[8]
# ---------------------

page[8].minuse = 1
page[8].maxuse = 1

image_dealerlogo.value = content.userselect.image.value
image_dealerlogo.visible = false
text_dealername.value = content.userselect.bodytext.value

text_dealeraddress.value = content.userselect.bodytext.value
